medina sil samadan wana uwasi uwasiyan sandaha ‘budusarana’ puwathpatha nomile bedadimata da katayuthu yoda athi athara dayaka sabhawe sabhapathi dab.ee. gunasinha sama lekam rohana rawindra mahathwaru budusarana bedadima sandaha dayakathwaya sapaya atha.kurundugaha hathapma awata wiharasthanayanhi ha jayabima galagodaaththa samadhi wiweka senasanaye pehewas samadanwana upasaka upasikawan sandaha wesak poho dina ‘budusarana’ puwathpath dharma danaya washayen bedadimata katayuthu yoda atha.kurundugaha hathapme somadasa nanayakkara mahatha wisin paralo sapath thama demawpiyanwana en.dab.ji. piyasena mahatha saha em.em. withanachchi mahathmiyata pin pinisa dahatharawana waratath ema ‘budusarana’ dharmadanaya sidu kere.
